# Vishal Warriors

Vishal Warriors, also known as Vishal Group Warriors (), was one of the franchise cricket teams of the first edition of the Everest Premier League. It was captained by Paras Khadka and coached by Mahesh Rizal.
Squad
* Paras Khadka (c)
* Sagar Pun
* Manjeet Shrestha
* Raju Rijal
* Suraj Kurmi
* Ramnaresh Giri
* Yagyaman Kumal
* Deepesh Khatri
* Prakash KC
* Bhivatsu Thapa
* Adeel Khan
* Nurdhos Singh
* Irshad Ahmed
* Susan Bhari
